email.label: Email address
email.help: We will use this to send you important stuff — like password resets, not cat memes. Promise.

confirmation.label: Enter confirmation code
confirmation.description: We have sent you a confirmation code to your new email address, please paste it here to confirm your email address change.

name.label: Display name
name.help: This is how others will see you around the app. Keep it cool — or weird, we don’t judge.

delete.label: Delete account
delete.help: This will nuke your account and all your data—no going back. Only do this if you're 100% sure. Seriously.

confirmation.title: Are you sure?
confirmation.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
confirmation.cancel: Nope, I have changed my mind

errors.title: Unexpected server error occurred
errors.detail: We could not process your request due to a runtime error. Please try again and if the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.

code.OAUTH_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Unexpected server error occurred while logging you in. Please try again and if the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.
code.OAUTH_MISSING_AUTHORIZATION_STATE: Please try logging in again. If the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.
code.OAUTH_RESPONSE_BODY_ERROR: Authorization server returned an error. Please checkout the details below.
code.OAUTH_UNSUPPORTED_OPERATION: Unexpected server error occurred while logging you in. Please try again and if the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.
code.OAUTH_WWW_AUTHENTICATE_CHALLENGE: Unexpected server error occurred while logging you in. Please try again and if the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.
code.OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_RESPONSE_ERROR: Authorization server returned an error. Please checkout the details below.
code.OAUTH_JWT_USERINFO_EXPECTED: Authorization server did not return your account information. Please get in touch with our support team to resolve this issue.
code.OAUTH_PARSE_ERROR: Unexpected server error occurred while logging you in. Please try again and if the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.
code.OAUTH_INVALID_RESPONSE: Authorization server returned an invalid response. Please get in touch with our support team to resolve this issue.
code.OAUTH_INVALID_REQUEST: Unexpected server error occurred while logging you in. Please try again and if the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.
code.OAUTH_RESPONSE_IS_NOT_JSON: Authorization server returned an invalid response. Please get in touch with our support team to resolve this issue.
code.OAUTH_RESPONSE_IS_NOT_CONFORM: Authorization server returned an invalid response. Please get in touch with our support team to resolve this issue.
code.OAUTH_HTTP_REQUEST_FORBIDDEN: Unexpected server error occurred while logging you in. Please try again and if the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.
code.OAUTH_REQUEST_PROTOCOL_FORBIDDEN: Unexpected server error occurred while logging you in. Please try again and if the problem persists, please get in touch with our support team.
code.OAUTH_JWT_TIMESTAMP_CHECK: The issued Access Token is either expired or not yet ready for use.
code.OAUTH_JWT_CLAIM_COMPARISON: The issued Access Token is invalid.
code.OAUTH_JSON_ATTRIBUTE_COMPARISON: The issued Access Token is invalid.
code.OAUTH_KEY_SELECTION: Could not find a JSON Web Key to validate the Access Token signatures. Please get in touch with our support team to resolve this issue.
code.OAUTH_MISSING_SERVER_METADATA: Could not resolve Authorization Server metadata. Please get in touch with our support team to resolve this issue.
code.OAUTH_INVALID_SERVER_METADATA: Could not resolve Authorization Server metadata. Please get in touch with our support team to resolve this issue.
